group.label: Storefront Output
group.comment: This config section may look very tricky. In fact it provides a ton of flexibility to integrate labels in any Magento 2 theme. You have to know what is CSS selector and how to build them and how to use.

field.label: Product Page - image labels target
field.comment: CSS selector of element where you want to show labels.

field.label: Product Page - content labels target
field.comment: CSS selector of element where you want to show labels.

field.label: Category Page - list item
field.comment: CSS selector for product list item on category page or any other listing.

field.label: Category Page - image labels target
field.comment: CSS selector of element after what you want to show labels. Please remember, this selector use in context of list item from config above.

field.label: Category Page - content labels target
field.comment: CSS selector of element after what you want to show labels. Please remember, this selector use in context of list item from config above.

field.label: Labels output strategy
field.comment: Output strategy defines Magento behavior whene there are multiple labels for the same position. Ordered - show all labels ordered by "Sort Order" value. Sinlge - show one label with largest "Sort order".
